# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O nfvo-driver-sdnc-zte-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/nfvo/sfc-driver-standalone/nfvo-drivers-sdnc-zte-sfc-driver/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/nfvo-drivers-sdnc-zte-sfc-driver-1.1.0-20161103.114239-7.zip" && unzip -q -o -B nfvo-driver-sdnc-zte-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f nfvo-driver-sdnc-zte-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8411
RUN echo Open-O nfvo-driver-sdnc-zte 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/nfvo/sfc-driver-standalone/nfvo-drivers-sdnc-zte-sfc-driver/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/nfvo-drivers-sdnc-zte-sfc-driver-1.1.0-20161103.114239-7.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
